Centralize.NAME: Centralize
Centralize.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card from draw pile into your hand. NL Single: Upgrade it for the combat.
Centralize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from draw pile into your hand. NL Single: Upgrade them for the combat.

SpareBottle.NAME: Spare Bottle
SpareBottle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

FlowerPower.NAME: Flower Power
FlowerPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength per Flower card in your deck.
FlowerPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity per Flower card in your deck.

FlowerWind.NAME: Flower Wind
FlowerWind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. Draw !M! extra card at the start of your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and Frail. Draw !M! extra card at the start of your turn.
Gain !M! Weak. Draw !M! extra card at the start of your turn.
Draw !M! extra card at the start of your turn.

SacredSoil.NAME: Sacred Soil
SacredSoil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When obtained, permanently upgrade ALL your Flower cards.

SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL your Flower cards for the combat. Deal 5 damage for each of them. Exhaust.
SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Upgrade ALL your Flower cards for the combat. Deal 5 damage for each of them. Exhaust.

CollectorsShot.NAME: Collector's Shot
CollectorsShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage per unique cards in your deck.

CollectorsDrill.NAME: Collector's Drill
CollectorsDrill.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are !M! unique cards in your discard pile. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: unique cards in my discard pile.

FruitForce.NAME: Fruit Force
FruitForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! % max HP. When you pick this, gain 3 max HP.

MagicLamp.NAME: Magic Lamp
MagicLamp.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. When you add this to your deck, also add Light! and Shadow!
MagicLamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 or 2 cards randomly. When you add this to your deck, also add Light! and Shadow!.

LightMagic.NAME: Light!
LightMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw 1 card with 50% chance.

ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow!
ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card with 50% chance.

CoupDeGrace.NAME: Coup De Grace
CoupDeGrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If targetâ€™s current HP is less than half of yours, attack twice.

FirstAidPotion.NAME: First-Aid Potion
FirstAidPotion.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! % of missing HP. NL Exhaust.

CarefulStrike.NAME: Careful Strike
CarefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may put !M! card on top of your deck.

TrickStyle.NAME: Trick Style
TrickStyle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. When Retained, it changes to Block-giving Skill.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! Block. Retain. When Retained, it reverts to Attack.

Snatch.NAME: Snatch
Snatch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Once: Obtain a random lesser potion to the Sack.

QuickSynthesis.NAME: Quick Synthesis
QuickSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! lesser potion to the Sack. NL Exhaust.
QuickSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! lesser potions to the Sack. NL Exhaust.

FlamingBottle.NAME: Flaming Bottle
FlamingBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Obtain a Lesser Fire Potion to your Sack. NL Exhaust.

PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! Lesser Poison Potion to your Sack. Poison damage is increased by 100% this combat.
PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! Lesser Poison Potions to your Sack. Poison damage is increased by 100% this combat.

Pollute.NAME: Pollute
Pollute.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, Apply !M! Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

GatherMaterial.NAME: Gather Material
GatherMaterial.DESCRIPTION: Gain [G] for each card in your hand with 2 or more cost.

Convert.NAME: Convert
Convert.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. If it is a Potion, gain !B! Block.

SecretPlan.NAME: Secret Plan
SecretPlan.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Retain up to 1 card this turn.
SecretPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Retain up to 2 cards this turn.

WoolGloves.NAME: Wool Gloves
WoolGloves.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Once: Draw 3 cards, then discard 3 cards.

Salvage.NAME: Salvage
Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP. Apply !M! Vulnerable.
LastResort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP +4. Apply !M! Vulnerable.
